org.apache.hadoop.fs.s3a.commit

Class MagicCommitIntegration

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.hadoop.fs.s3a.commit.MagicCommitIntegration

  • public class MagicCommitIntegration
extends Object
    Adds the code needed for S3A to support magic committers. It's pulled out to keep S3A FS class slightly less complex. This class can be instantiated even when magic commit is disabled; in this case:
    1. isMagicCommitPath(Path) will always return false.
    2. createTracker(Path, String) will always return an instance of PutTracker.

    Important

    : must not directly or indirectly import a class which uses any datatype in hadoop-mapreduce.

    • Method Detail

      • keyOfFinalDestination

        public String keyOfFinalDestination(List<String> elements,
                                    String key)
        Given an (elements, key) pair, return the key of the final destination of the PUT, that is: where the final path is expected to go?
        Parameters:
        elements - path split to elements
        key - key
        Returns:
        key for final put. If this is not a magic commit, the same as the key in.

      • createTracker

        public PutTracker createTracker(org.apache.hadoop.fs.Path path,
                                String key)
        Given a path and a key to that same path, create a tracker for it. This specific tracker will be chosen based on whether or not the path is a magic one.
        Parameters:
        path - path of nominal write
        key - key of path of nominal write
        Returns:
        the tracker for this operation.

      • isMagicCommitEnabled

        public boolean isMagicCommitEnabled()
        Is magic commit enabled?
        Returns:
        true if magic commit is turned on.

      • isMagicCommitPath

        public boolean isMagicCommitPath(org.apache.hadoop.fs.Path path)
        Predicate: is a path a magic commit path?
        Parameters:
        path - path to examine
        Returns:
        true if the path is or is under a magic directory
